question: Why the Buddha’s teachings are considered to be along the middle path?
option1: It was based on two cultures
option2: It avoided the extremes of habitual sensuality and habitual self-torture
option3: It may be practiced by all very easily
option4: It stood between the Vedic religion and Jainism
answer: It avoided the extremes of habitual sensuality and habitual self-torture
explanation: It avoided the extremes of habitual sensuality and habitual self-torture
